Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Doing a Predoctoral Research Stay but You Were Afraid to Ask

28
Cultural shocks:
• Inform yourself about
cultural differences (eg, 
two kisses).
• Try to survive.
• Anyway, there are 
Spaniards/Hispanic-ishs
almost everywhere .
Language:

IN ADVANCE.
• Even just basics (eg, 
Japanse syllabaries, basic
expressions).
